name: Fortress (itch) (David Mills - Game Developer!)
description:
Defend the castle against the "heroes" that seek to siege it and steal all the gold!

You're the Head of Security, and the sorceress of the castle is working on spell craft. She is not to be disturbed, especially by any of those meddlesome heroes constantly storming the place! 

That's where you come in: It is your job to keep the looters at bay by any means; burn them, decapitate them, feed them to giant lizards -- anything goes! Just keep those thieves from stealing all the gold!

Features:

- Set off deadly booby traps and KILL the invaders looking to rob the gold!

- Defend a sexy sorceress!

- Supports keyboard and gamepad controls!

- Release demonic swordsman and monstrous attack bugs to do your bidding!

- Unlock PERKS as you progress: from higher minion stock per stage to more efficient upgrades that allow minions to tag team kills!

- Combo system allows for massive killing - combos to rack up experience used to upgrade!

NOTE: Available for in either WINDOWED or FULLSCREEN versions for Windows, Mac and Linux! Be sure to select the one you want below!
